body: I liked DA-Hee from start.
It's a manhwa

Weaboos nigga when reading this: "this is trash, garbag, bla bla bla"
also them when they read some doujin about ugly ass old man raping some milkf: "ah yes masterpiece,so fucking hot"

Trash manhwa. 

I can’t believe this is my first comment in this site.
Retarded author
serio que esse filho da puta do autor deu um final feliz pra esse fdp enquanto a única garota q presta ainda chorava por ele, cadê aqueles fãs loucos pra matar esse lazarento
@Eldians revenge... You state a good point there, sir
Dk y but it makes me kinda sad that it’s finished 😢

Preferred Dahee to Hyemi since beginning but I can't say am satisfied with that cruel ending seeing as they both hurt Hyemi so bad, the author could've used a lot of other means to sink Jinmi ship but nah, either he don't make over 50+ chapters focused on her or do the same plus more for the Dahee, he chose the oldest cheapest dumbest trick, can't blame no one but author at the end of the day, trash writing. Feels like I won a noble prize but lost a best friend. Shit

I've wasted ~50 hours on this. Been following this since 90ish chapter. Always knew this was going to shit all over me.  I've never wanted to punch someone as bad as I want to punch this author right now. 
Manhwas are truly the absolute bottom tier shit. I'll stick to only mangas/doujins from now.

I swear to God, Manhwa is cursed with rushed and Bad ending, this is literally bad. I mean Hyemi got betrayed hard and Jihoo had the AUDACITY to say you will always be my Noona, Fuck you Jihoo

I have read a lot and many started good and ended so bad.
Like Cohabitation with ex wife, all that build up and character progression where they started to understand and like each other again only for the MC to go to the other girl and had an ambiguous ending

Then there's Fatal woman where the FMC has to lose his Boyfriend twice because she had the worst luck of meeting a rival who would kill themselves rather than lose the BF so she had to leave her BF TWICE and had the ending of " I CHOSE FRIENDSHIP OVER LOVE BECAUSE THIS BITCH WOULD RATHER KILL HERSELF THAN LOSE TO ME". And then meet the guy She had an affair with ( She was fucking another woman's Man who was also cheating ). And then give off the ship Vibe. I could probably name more Manhwa with Bad endings but these are the worst I could
Hyemi deserve better, MC is an asshole and deserved to be cucked in worst way possible. Hope Dahae cucks him, so that He would feel what Hyemi felt after fucking her best friend behind her back.

Also, really. 

One page per panel? Man, call me weeb or smth but i found the blank spaces of manhwa really breaks the immersion. 

Unlike that horror jumpscare stuff from naver, (bongchongdong or something, i don't really remember) now that is a good manhwa gimmick
Man, curse of mahnwa/webtoon i guess. With all the good art, it's either rushed or got shitty ending
Rush & bad ending...
Trash end
I'm glad MM dropped this shit. What a mess.
Mc's mind is unreal.

ROFLMAO Just as I predicted last year that this will turn into a shit show and no one believed me, now look at this crap HAHAHA. Not only that, "Silent War" is heading towards the same direction so really...
nigga no one cares
Ayo Les go! First comment and favourite!
